name: Rails Gem Collector
description:
Play in-bowser or download onto 64-bit Windows!

Get ready for five choppy levels of this 1-bit, orb-collecting, rail-running, enemy-dodging game!

Starting

Updated so that you can play in-browser.

You should also be able to download the ZIP, extract it, then run the "BitterJamProject.exe" so long as you are on 64-bit Windows.

Controls

  • W,A,S,D for movement (where rail allows)
  • Esc to quit

Playing

Movement is on 3 types of "rails":

  • straight rails that allow you to move back and forth or up and down
  • curved rails that change your direction
  • intersection rails that allow you to move in any direction

Collect all 3 gems on each level. Dodge enemies on levels 2-5. If you're hit 3 times you'll have to restart from level 1. Collect all gems on all 5 levels to win!
